modules.description: This module implements low-level operations for interacting with block devices, including connecting to and disconnecting from devices, reading from and writing to specific sectors, and retrieving device metadata. It works with abstract block device handles (`t`), structured error types for read and write failures, and uses `Cstruct.t` buffers for data transfer. Concrete use cases include direct disk access, virtual block device management, and implementing storage backends for virtualization or filesystems.
